{"id":490173126,"lang":"cpp","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1620422928,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/490173126/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"6.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(const string& word1, const string& word2) {\n        if (word1.length() < word2.length()) {\n            return minDistance(word2, word1);\n        }\n        int n = word1.length();\n        int m = word2.length();\n        vector<int> dp(m, 0);\n        for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) dp[i-1] = i;\n        int curr;\n        int prevd;\n        int prev;\n        int add;\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n            prevd = i;\n            prev = i + 1;\n            for (int j = 0; j < m; ++j) {\n                curr = dp[j];\n                add = (word1[i] != word2[j]) * 2;\n                dp[j] = min(prevd + add, 1 +min(dp[j], prev));\n                prevd = curr;\n                prev = dp[j];\n            }\n        }\n        return dp.back();\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings"}
